lyrics:
18 contributorsfarewell lyricsverse 1
wherever youre going
i wanna go
wherever youre headed
can you let me know
i dont mind catching up
im on my way

prechorus

and even though it kills me

i know itll be sadder

chorus
so farewell
somebodys gonna miss you miss you miss you miss you
farewell
somebodys gonna wish that you were here
that somebodys me

but you wont miss nothing but the same old song

ill spend the day
telling you stories about a land far away
but i know
you might also likeprechorus
